title: Software Engineer
taskPerformed: Assisted in writing and testing code under the guidance of senior developers to ensure high-quality software delivery.
Participated in debugging sessions, identifying and fixing minor bugs to improve the overall performance of the application.
Contributed to the documentation of code and processes to support knowledge sharing and onboarding of new team members.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure that all aspects of the project align with the overall objectives.
Reviewed code written by peers, providing constructive feedback to help improve code quality and maintainability.
Actively engaged in learning and applying new technologies, tools, and programming practices to stay updated with industry trends.

Mengerjakan tugas-tugas yang lebih kecil seperti penanganan bug sederhana, penambahan fitur kecil, atau modifikasi minor pada aplikasi yang ada, seringkali di bawah pengawasan ketat dari pengembang senior.
